data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Riau that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Riau, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Riau that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Riau. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Riau, Indonesia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Mamak, Talang people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Riau, Indonesia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Riau, Indonesia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, it’s possible most of the 5,070,537 lost people in  Riau, Indonesia have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.
